discussion_comments.comment_body: This makes sure that the `.eslintrc.js` file can be imported from other repos without it trying to search for `config-airbnb-typescript.js` file in the local folders.
in eslint 9 we will be able to just list the preset as an object

@oliviertassinari I have to make the change to this, otherwise, https://material-ui.netlify.app/experiments/ no longer works after this PR is merged.

For the core repo, https://app.netlify.com/sites/material-ui/settings/deploys#branches, `master` branch has `process.env.CONTEXT === 'production'` (not `branch-deploy`).
